Text: Are these the official App Store versions?
big file...downloaded all night and did not work. no white screen or anything. am i missing something?
it's working with me but..the screen stay rotating
vice city works fine...gta 3 works fine however i cannot spin 360 which makes it very difficult when aiming at a target whos running around behind you...how to fix?
Where is the "real" native MacOS X version of "Grand Theft Auto 3" ?
dan66, i don't understand what i am suppose to get from the link. i have macbook pro 13"  early 2011 with lion. has anyone got it to work on lion?
i downloaded it in 15 min. and it worked immediately! just copy the files GTA 3 and Vice City to Applications folder and you can play!
Working on my late macbook pro 2011!!! I have lion. Great quality. Only problem on GTA 3 i can't 360 turn anybody has a solution?

It works! GTA 3 and GTA VC, no prob I'm running mac os x 10.7, about GTA III 360 degrees mouse problem, I just press "escape" to pause and then I press again to return the game then the mouse will work for a short time..
btw, GTA VC I can't move my mouse when tommy rides any car..is this normal? thanks..
**MOUSE PROBLEM: Go to OPTIONS, change the controls from STANDARD to CLASSIC

Mouse Problem: Browse content of GTA3.app then Contents->Root open user.reg file and add line: [Software\Wine\AppDefaults\GTA3.exe\DirectInput] 1253946465
"MouseWarpOverride"="force"
